content: complimentary pattern chardon cowl design by sarah kenyon no 1321l loon lake 150g hank experience level - intermediate materials - woolstok worsted 100% fine highland wool 150g/370yds 1 hank - size 8 5mm 24 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge - stitch markers in contrasting colors - cable needle size - one finished measurements - circumference 23 - height 13½ gauge - in stockinette 20 sts and 24 row = 4 abbreviations 1/1 lc slip 1 st to cn hold to front k1 k1 from cn 2/2 lc slip 2 st to cn hold to front k2 k2 from cn 1/1 rc slip 1 st to cn hold to back k1 k1 from cn chardon cowl no 202140 2/2 rc slip 2 sts to cn hold to back k2 k2 from cn design by sarah kenyon pattern 4/1/rc/1/3/lc slip 4 sts to cn hold in back k1 slip last 3 sts from cn to left needle hold to cables cables and more cables this one hank wonder cowl is front k3 k1 from cn full of wonderful stitches and textures bobble bind off cn cable needle co cast on k knit k1tbl knit 1 stitch through the back loop meas measures p purl pm place marker repeat repeat complimentary pattern blue sky fibers cowl co 156 sts pm in contrasting color to mark beg of round and join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts work in k2 p2 rib for 5 rnds round 1 *work in cable rib for 22 sts pm p1 k1tbl p1 pm work circle rope round 1 pm work horseshoe round 1 pm work circle rope round 1 pm p1 k1tbl p1 pm repeat from * to end of round using stitch markers different color from beg of round marker round 2 *work next round in cable rib for 22 sts sm p1 k1tbl p1 sm work circle rope round 2 sm work horseshoe round 2 sm work circle rope round 2 sm p1 k1tbl p1 sm repeat from * to end of round round 3 *work next round cable rib for 22 sts sm p1 k1tbl p1 sm work circle rope round 3 sm work horseshoe round 3 sm work circle rope round 3 sm p1 k1tbl p1 sm repeat from * to end of round round 4 *work next round in cable rib for 22 sts sm p1 k1tbl p1 sm work circle rope round 4 sm work horseshoe round 4 sm work circle rope round 4 sm p1 k1tbl p1 sm repeat from * to end of round round s round s round 5 *work next round in cable rib for 22 sts sm p1 sm slip marker slip marker from left needle to
